casebody.data:
Allied Spectrum, LLC
v.
German Auto Center, Inc., et al. 453A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 17, 2017 J. Denton Adams, Attorney at Law, Brice Bratcher, Attorney at Law, for Allied Spectrum, LLC. John S. Austin, Attorney at Law, for German Auto Center, Inc., et al.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 17th of February 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 17th of February 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 20th day of March 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
